item.title: Metform Contact Form
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
<label for="mf-input-text-191a0edd">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Full Name`) } 					*
				</label>
			<input type="text" id="mf-input-text-191a0edd" 
				name="mf-listing-fname" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your name`) } "
				onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
									aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-listing-fname'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":"1","maxLength":"40","type":"by_word_length","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el) }
							/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-listing-fname"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-email-44bbf5dd">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Business Email`) } 					*
				</label>
			<input 
				type="email" 
				defaultValue="" 
				class="mf-input " 
				id="mf-input-email-44bbf5dd" 
				name="mf-email" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your email address here`) } " 
				onBlur=${parent.handleChange} onFocus=${parent.handleChange} aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-email'] ? 'true' : 'false' } 
				ref=${el=> parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","emailMessage":"Please enter a valid Email address","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)}
							/>
						<${validation.ErrorMessage} 
				errors=${validation.errors} 
				name="mf-email" 
				as=${html``}
			/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-193386fe">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Company Name`) } 					
				</label>
			<input
				type="text"
				class="mf-input "
				id="mf-input-text-193386fe"
				name="mf-company-name"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Enter Company Name`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					onBlur=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-company-name'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el =>{
												parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":false,"expression":"null"}, el)
					}}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-company-name"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-274e4fdf">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Subject`) } 					*
				</label>
			<input
				type="text"
				class="mf-input "
				id="mf-input-text-274e4fdf"
				name="mf-subject"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Topic or subject contact us`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					onBlur=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-subject'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el =>{
												parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)
					}}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-subject"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-area-1e5be622">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Message`) } 					*
				</label>
			<textarea id="mf-input-text-area-1e5be622"
				name="mf-yourmessage" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Say anything to ask me`) } "
				cols="30" rows="10"
									onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-yourmessage'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)}
								></textarea>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-yourmessage"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<button type="submit" id="">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Contact Us`) } 
				</button>

item.title: Before Footer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
~ Peace love for you
In magna est, euismod efficitur dui id, scelerisque commodo justo. Donec sino tristique id. Aliquam ut enim ante. Nam at orci id ipsum egestas interdum. Aenean iaculis, nulla id ★★★★★ 5/5 5.00
George Gandos
★★★★★ 5/5 5.00
Ralph Edwards
Cameron William

Founder Ovesment, Inc

item.title: Metform Contact Form
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
<label for="mf-input-text-61e05c69">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Full Name`) } 					*
				</label>
			<input type="text" id="mf-input-text-61e05c69" 
				name="mf-listing-fname" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your name`) } "
				onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
									aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-listing-fname'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":"1","maxLength":"40","type":"by_word_length","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el) }
							/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-listing-fname"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-email-5f875217">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Business Email`) } 					*
				</label>
			<input 
				type="email" 
				defaultValue="" 
				class="mf-input " 
				id="mf-input-email-5f875217" 
				name="mf-email" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your email address here`) } " 
				onBlur=${parent.handleChange} onFocus=${parent.handleChange} aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-email'] ? 'true' : 'false' } 
				ref=${el=> parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","emailMessage":"Please enter a valid Email address","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)}
							/>
						<${validation.ErrorMessage} 
				errors=${validation.errors} 
				name="mf-email" 
				as=${html``}
			/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-3f4113b6">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Company Name`) } 					
				</label>
			<input
				type="text"
				class="mf-input "
				id="mf-input-text-3f4113b6"
				name="mf-company-name"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Enter Company Name`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					onBlur=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-company-name'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el =>{
												parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":false,"expression":"null"}, el)
					}}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-company-name"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-4fba0583">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Subject`) } 					*
				</label>
			<input
				type="text"
				class="mf-input "
				id="mf-input-text-4fba0583"
				name="mf-subject"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Topic or subject contact us`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					onBlur=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-subject'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el =>{
												parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)
					}}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-subject"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<label for="mf-input-text-area-29ead468">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Message`) } 					*
				</label>
			<textarea id="mf-input-text-area-29ead468"
				name="mf-yourmessage" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Say anything to ask me`) } "
				cols="30" rows="10"
									onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-yourmessage'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)}
								></textarea>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-yourmessage"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<button type="submit" id="">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Contact Us`) } 
				</button>

item.title: New Form # 1719828230
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Your Details

Let us know how to get back to you.

{ parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el) }} /> <${validation.ErrorMessage} errors=${validation.errors} name="mf-first-name" as=${html``} /> ${ parent.decodeEntities(`Enter your first name here`) } { parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el) }} /> <${validation.ErrorMessage} errors=${validation.errors} name="mf-last-name" as=${html``} /> ${ parent.decodeEntities(`Enter your last name here`) } parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","emailMessage":"Please enter a valid Email address","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)} /> <${validation.ErrorMessage} errors=${validation.errors} name="mf-email" as=${html``} /> ${ parent.decodeEntities(`Example: user@website.com`) } { parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el) }} /> <${validation.ErrorMessage} errors=${validation.errors} name="mf-subject" as=${html``} /> ${ parent.decodeEntities(`How can we help you?`) } parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)} /> <${validation.ErrorMessage} errors=${validation.errors} name="mf-telephone" as=${html``} /> parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","urlMessage":"Please enter a valid URL","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)} /> <${validation.ErrorMessage} errors=${validation.errors} name="mf-website" as=${html``} />

How can we help?

Feel free to ask a question or simply leave a comment

item.title: House invest concept

item.content:encoded: House invest concept

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
TIMMAL INVESTMENT HOLDINGS

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a pivotal force in the socio-economic development of South Africa. Read More

Why Choose TIMVEST

Investors should choose TimVest for its track record of delivering consistent and strong returns, its transparent and trustworthy investment strategy, and its commitment to personalized customer service and support. With TimVest, you can feel confident that your investments are in capable hands and that your financial goals are being prioritized.

Customer satisfaction is our top priority. We value transparency and open communication with our clients. We are committed to continuous improvement and innovation. We strive for excellence in all aspects of our work. We prioritize the well-being of our employees and the environment.

KEY SERVICES

Strategic Investment

Provide support in identifying and evaluating investment opportunities that align with social and economic development goals.

Portfolio Management

Offer management services that help optimize the performance of investments in social enterprises or small businesses

Impact Assessment:

Conduct detailed impact assessments to measure the social, economic, and environmental effects of investments, ensuring alignment with broader goals of empowerment and sustainability

Networking Opportunities

Facilitate connections with key industry players, market leaders, and innovators to foster partnerships and collaborative opportunities

Compliance and Due Diligence Services

Ensure all investments comply with local regulations and best practices, including thorough due diligence checks.

Risk Management

Our services include comprehensive risk assessments to mitigate potential financial losses and ensure stable returns

Start Investing with Timvest To Be A Part Of Your Life For A Good Future

Market Analysis
We highlight the use of in-depth market analysis to identify and capitalize on lucrative opportunities within sectors poised for growth, particularly those that can drive social change
Ensuring Viability and Profitability
The dual focus of Timmal Investment Holdings on both financial returns and social outcomes, emphasizes our belief that robust investment returns and positive community impact are not mutually exclusive but mutually reinforcing
Capacity Building
Explain how investor services include supporting enterprises in building their capacities, which in turn helps communities by creating jobs, enhancing skills, and improving local economies

Happy Life Stories With Us

At Timvest, we prioritize creating happy lives for our clients by providing them with personalized investment strategies that align with their financial goals and values. Our team of experienced professionals works closely with each client to understand their unique circumstances and develop a comprehensive plan that maximizes their return on investment while mitigating risk.

By focusing on long-term growth and sustainability, we aim to not only grow our clients' wealth but also enhance their overall well-being and happiness. Our ultimate goal is to provide financial security and freedom so that our clients can enjoy the life they have always imagined.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kamal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

GET IN TOUCH WITH US! CHAIRMAN@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 MARKET STREET, NORTHRIDING, GAUTENG, 2162

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About us

About Timvest Principles

At Timvest, our core principles guide everything we do. We are dedicated to providing unparalleled customer satisfaction through transparent and open communication. Our commitment to excellence is rooted in integrity and honesty, driving us to continuously improve and innovate. Respect and professionalism are at the forefront of all our interactions, as we prioritize the well-being of our employees and the environment. We uphold high standards of quality and service in everything we do, striving to exceed expectations and deliver exceptional results.

About Timvest Cultures

At Timvest, our culture is built on collaboration, innovation, and diversity. We foster a positive and inclusive environment where every voice is valued and heard. Our team is dedicated to continuous learning and growth, supporting one another in personal and professional development. We encourage creativity, problem-solving, and taking initiative to drive success and achieve our goals. Together, we embody a strong sense of community, teamwork, and mutual respect, creating a dynamic and vibrant workplace that inspires excellence and achievement.

Why Choose Timvest

At Timvest, our core principles guide everything we do. We are dedicated to providing unparalleled customer satisfaction through transparent and open communication. Our commitment to excellence is rooted in integrity and honesty, driving us to continuously improve and innovate. Respect and professionalism are at the forefront of all our interactions, as we prioritize the well-being of our employees and the environment. 

Customer satisfaction is our top priority. We value transparency and open communication with our clients. We are committed to continuous improvement and innovation. We strive for excellence in all aspects of our work. We prioritize the well-being of our employees and the environment.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kamal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

GET IN TOUCH WITH US ! CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

item.title: Uncontained
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
UNCONTAIND is a pioneering eco-friendly business and retail park in Johannesburg's Northern Suburbs, ingeniously constructed using the principles of cargo-texture—transforming shipping containers into functional, sustainable spaces. This innovative approach not only emphasizes our commitment to environmental responsibility but also showcases the versatility and potential of cargo-texture in modern urban design. We specialize in property management, focusing on creating spaces that support creativity, collaboration, and business growth. Our services cater to a diverse clientele, offering shared workspaces, venue hire, and comprehensive business support services designed to empower African entrepreneurs and SMEs. At UNCONTAIND, we are dedicated to fostering a community where sustainability and innovation thrive. We provide a dynamic platform that connects SMEs with global opportunities, promoting a culture of creativity and forward-thinking. Join us at UNCONTAIND, where your ideas have the space to grow and your business the support to flourish.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kamal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

GET IN TOUCH WITH US CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

item.title: Eskilz College
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Eskilz College, established in 2002, is a premier private FET college known for its expansive array of over 100 full qualifications and thousands of short courses designed to cater to a diverse learning demographic. Our innovative approach to education includes a variety of delivery methods such as online, face-to-face, correspondence, and blended learning, ensuring that we meet the unique needs of each student. Recognizing the importance of accessibility, we offer flexible payment options to facilitate the educational journey of our learners. Our commitment to quality is evidenced by our ISO 9001 accreditation, alongside accreditations with DHET, SETAs, and QCTO. This solidifies our standing as a trusted provider of industry-relevant education and training across numerous sectors, capable of operating on a national scale. Our team’s dynamic nature, combined with their hard work and extensive experience, drives our mission forward. As we pursue accreditation with the CHE, Eskilz College is expanding its footprint, establishing training centers in neighboring countries to broaden our impact. We tailor our Business Solutions to meet the specific needs of corporate clients, offering services that include assistance with securing funded training, maximizing tax benefits, and enhancing BBBEE points. Our inclusive approach extends to education from Grade 9 upwards, offering a matric equivalent and recognizing the value of prior learning through our RPL accreditation. Dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment, we have developed programs specifically designed for individuals with disabilities, emphasizing our belief in education for all. Our unique focus on entrepreneurship as an exit strategy empowers our graduates to not just enter the job market, but to innovate within it. Our expertise spans professional and rural development, ensuring that our training is not only relevant but transformative. Eskilz College stands as a beacon of opportunity and growth, dedicated to empowering individuals and organizations through comprehensive, accessible, and quality education and training solutions. Our vision extends beyond traditional education, aiming to equip our learners with the skills, knowledge, and confidence to thrive in their chosen fields and to contribute positively to their communities.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

GET IN TOUCH WITH US CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

item.title: Intelligent Computing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Intelligent Computing stands as a leader in the digital transformation sector, committed to elevating businesses by enhancing their digital presence and leveraging cutting-edge automation technologies. Our expert team harnesses the power of artificial intelligence and future technologies to design and develop bespoke solutions that not only adapt to the evolving digital landscape but also actively shape it. As your strategic partners in innovation, we transform complex challenges into growth opportunities, ensuring that your business stays ahead in the competitive market. By focusing on customized, scalable solutions, we help our clients achieve operational excellence and drive sustainable growth. Let us help you navigate the digital frontier with solutions that are as forward-thinking as they are effective.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kamal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA​ 010 0300 080​ 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162​

item.title: Sizanani
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Sizanani Charity, officially registered in 2007, has its roots deeply embedded in the philanthropic legacy of the Timmal family, originating in the 1880s in uTongathi, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. The charity’s story begins with Mr. Deby Timmal, an Indian indentured labourer who arrived on the shores of what was then Port Natal. Despite the constraints of his indentured status, Mr. Timmal's entrepreneurial spirit flourished; he acquired farmland from sugar cane barons in Tongaat and generously allocated land to the local Indian community for a place of worship and a school. This tradition of community support was carried forward by his son Ramjuttan Timmal, who provided local farmers with land to foster sustainable farming practices. The philanthropic spirit was sustained by Parmesar, another of Mr. Timmal’s descendants, who moved to Durban and entered the clothing business. Parmesar became one of the first non-white manufacturers and distributors of protective clothing in South Africa and supported local home industries by helping them acquire sewing machines and subcontracting work to them. Guided by a family ethos encapsulated in Kamal Timmal’s words—“how could we have food on our plate when our neighbours go hungry?” Sizanani Charity has been a beacon of social entrepreneurship and communal support for over a century, a testament to a legacy that continues to enrich lives.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

GET IN TOUCH WITH US !​ CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA​ 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162​

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home Services

Articulate Your Future Financial Management with timvest

Enterprise & Supplier Development, Empowering Businesses and Fostering Growth

Impact Assessment

Conduct detailed impact assessments to measure the social, economic, and environmental
effects of investments, ensuring alignment with broader goals of empowerment and
sustainability.

Portfolio Management

TIMMAL INVESTMENT HOLDINGS OFFERS A RANGE OF SERVICES DESIGNED TO ASSIST INVESTORS
IN MAXIMIZING THEIR IMPACT AND RETURNS THROUGH STRATEGIC ENTERPRISE AND SUPPLIER
DEVELOPMENT.

Ensuring Viability and Profitability

Compliance and Due Diligence Services

The dual focus of Timmal Investment Holdings on both financial returns and social outcomes, emphasizes our belief that robust investment returns and positive community
impact are not mutually exclusive but mutually reinforcing

KEY SERVICES
Enhancing Social Impact

Targeted Investment in Key Sectors: We focus on investments in sectors such as education, healthcare, and sustainable energy, which are crucial for community development and empowerment.

Capacity Building

Explain how investor services include supporting enterprises in building their capacities, which in turn helps communities by creating jobs, enhancing skills, and improving local economies.

Partnership and Collaboration

Outline the facilitation of partnerships with NGOs, government bodies, and other entities to amplify the social impact of investments. Community Development and Empowerment

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US ! CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

item.title: The BizLab
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The BizLab is a cutting-edge consultation company that was established in 2002. We pride ourselves on being industry leaders in providing innovative and tailored solutions for businesses of all sizes. Our team of experienced consultants brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to every project, ensuring that our clients receive the highest quality service. At The BizLab, we specialize in helping businesses optimize their operations, improve efficiency, and achieve their strategic goals. Whether it's developing a comprehensive business plan, implementing new technologies, or increasing market share, we work closely with our clients to create customized solutions that drive success. Our commitment to excellence, integrity, and results-driven approach sets us apart from our competitors. With a proven track record of success, The BizLab has helped numerous clients across various industries navigate the ever-changing business landscape and achieve sustainable growth. Partner with The BizLab and take your business to the next level. Let us be your trusted advisor in achieving your business goals and maximizing your potential.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US ! CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

item.title: Venture Capital Fund
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Venture Capital Fund is a registered NCR Credit Provider dedicated to transforming the financial landscape in South Africa. We specialize in offering a range of financial products and instruments designed to address the needs of the unbanked population. With our pursuit of an FSB license, we are poised to enter commercial banking, focusing on strategic mergers and acquisitions. Our commitment is to provide a safe and robust investment environment, ensuring that our investors have a secure and profitable platform to grow their financial interests. Join us as we innovate and expand access to financial services across the nation the Small Business Chamber Africais dedicated to empowering small businesses across the continent. We are committed to nurturing entrepreneurship and fostering economic growth by providing robust support to small enterprises. At Small Business Chamber Africa, we understand the unique challenges and opportunities that small businesses face in the dynamic African market. Our mission is to create a thriving community where business owners can access essential resources, share knowledge, and collaborate to drive collective success. Our services include advocacy, training, networking events, and business support services tailored to the needs of small businesses. We strive to influence policy-making processes to create a more favorable business environment, ensuring that the voices of small business owners are heard at local, national, and continental levels. With members spanning a diverse range of industries, the Small Business Chamber Africa is a melting pot of ideas and innovation. We provide a platform for small businesses to connect with industry leaders, potential investors, and like-minded entrepreneurs to accelerate growth and development. Join us as we work together to shape the future of small business in Africa, fostering an ecosystem that supports sustainability, inclusivity, and prosperity for all.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US ! CEO@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://timvest.co.za/staging.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

267 Market Street, North Riding, Gauteng, 2162

Emergency Call

010 0300 080​

Work Hour Time

Mon To Fri: 8AM - 16:30PM
Weekend: Closed

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

item.title: ADA HUIGU
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
ADA HUIGU was founded in 2019 with a vision to empower communities and foster positive change in Namibia. Since our inception, we have worked tirelessly to address the various challenges faced by individuals and communities, striving to create a more inclusive and prosperous society. Mission Statement: Our mission at ADA HUIGU is to empower individuals and communities through comprehensive training and business development initiatives. We believe in the power of collaboration and mutual support, working together to create opportunities for growth and prosperity. To provide comprehensive training programs aimed at enhancing the skills and capacities of individuals. To facilitate access to resources and support systems that enable sustainable livelihoods and economic development. To foster partnerships and collaborations with stakeholders to maximize our impact and reach. To advocate for policies and initiatives that promote social inclusion, equality, and community development.

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

Founder and Chairman of Timvest

GET IN TOUCH WITH US! CHAIRMAN@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 MARKET STREET, NORTHRIDING, GAUTENG, 2162

item.title: Institution of Excellence
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Institute of Excellence, where we are redefining education for the future. As a member of the prestigious Timmal Investment Holdings, we bring 22 years of unparalleled experience in Higher Education and Business to the realm of primary and secondary education. Our extensive industry insights uniquely position us to run a school that nurtures young minds from Grade RR, aligning seamlessly with our cradle-to-career strategy. Our Vision At the Institute of Excellence, our vision is to cultivate a learning environment that fosters critical thinking, creativity, and digital literacy. We believe in preparing our students for the challenges of the modern world by equipping them with the skills and knowledge necessary to thrive in an ever-evolving global landscape. Our Curriculum Our future-focused curriculum integrates cutting-edge technology and innovative teaching methods to provide a comprehensive educational experience. From foundational subjects to advanced courses, we emphasize practical skills and critical analysis, ensuring our students are well-prepared for higher education and beyond. State-of-the-Art Facilities We pride ourselves on our modern facilities designed to support both academic and extracurricular activities. Our classrooms are equipped with the latest technology, including interactive whiteboards and digital platforms, to enhance the learning experience. Additionally, our laboratories, recreational areas, and sports facilities provide a well-rounded environment for student growth and development. Experienced Faculty Our team of dedicated educators is committed to continuous professional development, staying abreast of the latest educational trends and technologies. This ensures that our teaching methods are always at the forefront of educational excellence, providing our students with the best possible learning experience. Extracurricular Activities At the Institute of Excellence, we believe in the importance of nurturing all aspects of a student’s development. Our diverse range of extracurricular programs allows students to explore their interests and talents, fostering a well-rounded and enriching educational journey.r Heading Text Here

Timmal Investment Holdings has long been recognized as a  pivotal force in the socio economic development  of South Africa. As a public -private intermediary. We have cemented our role as proactive facilitators, driving initiatives for a  thriving nation. We provide  bespoke , scalable solutions that yield substantial return for our stakeholders.

Kammal P Timmal

CHAIRMAN AND FOUNDER OF TIMVEST

GET IN TOUCH WITH US! CHAIRMAN@TIMVEST.CO.ZA 010 0300 080 267 MARKET STREET, NORTHRIDING, GAUTENG, 2162
